p: King Abdulaziz Medical Center, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia used rRT-PCR assays to confirm cases and considers three negative rRT-PCR results to be negative for MERS. There were 130 lab-confirmed cases, and a 63.4% mortality rate. All MERS-CoV infected healthcare workers (HCW) survived. Researchers concluded the necessity of preparation and awareness in all hospital systems [ 9].
